ja.label_team_detile_3: 日本一に本気で挑戦すること
ja.label_team_detile_4: 「日本一を取りたい」という思いもと女子硬式野球チーム「瀬戸内ブルーシャインズ」誕生しました。 地元に愛されるチームを目指します。
ja.label_team_detile_6: なぜ女子チームなのか
ja.label_team_detile_7: 野球人口が減少している中、女子野球人口は増加、今までの野球のイメージや概念を覆す魅力が女子野球。
ja.label_team_detile_10: 1991年生まれ。岡山県瀬戸内市長船町出身、同志社高校、同志社大学硬式野球部出身小・中・高ではキャプテン、大学では投手責任者を務めた。キッコーマン株式会社⇒株式会社大町(専務取締役)
ja.label_team_detile_12: 女子硬瀬戸内ブルーシャインズは、岡山市の岡山学芸館高校やＩＰＵ環太平洋大学出身の選手など１３人が所属。２０２３年２月に発足した、県内３つ目の女子硬式野球の社会人チームです。
ja.label_team_detile_14: 瀬戸内ブルーシャインズ屋内練習場
ja.label_team_detile_15: 〒701-4262 岡山県瀬戸内市長船町東須恵1373-3

en.label_team_detile_3: Challenging to become the Best in Japan
en.label_team_detile_4: 'The women's baseball team Setouchi BlueShines was born with the desire to' to become Japan's No. 1 baseball team.
en.label_team_detile_5: The reason for creating the team
en.label_team_detile_7: 'While the baseball population is decreasing, the population of women playing baseball is increasing.Women's baseball possesses an appeal that challenges and overturns traditional images and conceptsof baseball.'
en.label_team_detile_10: 'Born in 1991. Hailing from Seto-uchi, Nagabune-cho, Okayama Prefecture. Graduated from Doshisha High School and played for Doshisha University's hardball baseball team. Served as captain in elementary, junior high, and high school, and as pitching manager in university.Worked at Kikkoman Corporation and currently holds the position of Executive Director at Omachi Co., Ltd'
en.label_team_detile_12: 'Setouchi Blue Shines, a women's hardball baseball team, consists of 13 players,including graduates from Okayama Gakugeikan High School in Okayama City and IPU Kanto Pacific University. It was established in February 2023 and is the third women's hardball baseball team in the prefecture'
en.label_team_detile_14: Setouchi Blue Shines Indoor Training Facility
en.label_team_detile_15: 1373-3 Higashi-sue, Nagafune-cho, Setouchi City, Okayama Prefecture, 701-4262.

vi.label_team_detile_3: Thử thách bản thân để trở thành một trong những tuyển thủ giỏi nhất tại Nhật Bản.
vi.label_team_detile_4: 'Với khát vọng trở thành đội bóng xuất sắc nhất Nhật Bản, đội bóng chày nữ 'Setouchi Blue Shines' đã ra đời.Chúng tôi hướng đến mục tiêu trở thành một đội bóng được yêu thích bởi cộng đồng địa phương.'
vi.label_team_detile_6: Tại sao là một đội bóng nữ?
vi.label_team_detile_7: 'Trong khi số lượng người chơi bóng chày đang giảm,  nữ giới chơi bóng chày đang tăng. Bóng chày nữ mang trong mình một sức hấp dẫn khác biệt, thách thức và làm thay đổi hình ảnh và khái niệm truyền thống về bóng chày'
vi.label_team_detile_8: Ý tưởng này thuộc về ai?
vi.label_team_detile_10: 'Sinh năm 1991. Xuất thân từ thành phố Seto-uchi, huyện Nagabune-cho, tỉnh Okayama.Tốt nghiệp Trường Trung học Doshisha và từng chơi cho đội bóng chày nữ Doshisha University.Đảm nhận vai trò đội trưởng ở trường tiểu học, trung học và trung học phổ thông, và là người phụ trách nhiệm vụ ném bóng ở đại học. Làm việc tại Công ty Kikkoman và hiện đang giữ vị trí Phó Giám đốc tại Công ty Omachi'
vi.label_team_detile_12: 'Setouchi Blue Shines, một đội bóng chày nữ chơi bóng chày , bao gồm 13 cầu thủ,bao gồm cựu học sinh trường Trung học Gakugeikan ở thành phố Okayama và Đại học IPU Kanto Thái Bình Dương. Đội được thành lập vào tháng 2 năm 2023 và là đội bóng chày nữ thứ ba trong tỉnh.'
vi.label_team_detile_14: Cơ sở tập luyện trong nhà của Setouchi Blue Shines
vi.label_team_detile_15: 1373-3 Higashi-sue, Nagafune-cho, thành phố Setouchi, tỉnh Okayama, mã bưu điện 701-4262

mm.label_team_detile_2: အသင်း၏ရည်မှန်းချက်
mm.label_team_detile_3: ဂျပန်မှာ ပထမအကောင်းဆုံးဖြစ်အောင် ခွန်အားအပြည့်ဖြင့်ယှဥ်ပြိုင်ခြင်း
mm.label_team_detile_4: အမျိုးသမီး ဘေ့စ်ဘောအသင်း 'Setouchi Blue Shines' သည် 'ဂျပန်တွင် နံပါတ်တစ်' ဖြစ်လိုသော ဆန္ဒဖြင့် မွေးဖွားလာခဲ့သည်။ ဒေသခံတွေ ချစ်ခင်နှစ်သက်တဲ့ အဖွဲ့ဖြစ်လာဖို့ ရည်ရွယ်သည်.။
mm.label_team_detile_5: အသင်းဖွဲ့စည်းရသည့်ရည်ရွယ်ချက်
mm.label_team_detile_6: ဘာကြောင့် အမျိုးသမီးအသင်း ဖွဲ့စည်းရသလဲ?
mm.label_team_detile_7: ဘေ့စ်ဘောကစားသမားဦးရေ ကျဆင်းနေသော်ငြားလည်း အမျိုးသမီးဘေ့စ်ဘောကစားသမားဦးရေမှာ တိုးလာခြင်း၊ အမျိုးသမီးဘေ့စ်ဘော အားကစားသည် သမရိုးကျဆန်သော ဘေ့စ်ဘောလောက၏စိန်ခေါ်မှုနှင့် ပုံရိပ်ကို ပြောင်းလဲနိုင်သော စွမ်းရည်ရှိခြင်း
mm.label_team_detile_8: ဘယ်သူရဲ့အကြံညာဏ်ပါလဲ?
mm.label_team_detile_9: အထွေထွေမန်နေဂျာ Sohifhiro Akiyama
mm.label_team_detile_10: ၁၉၉၁ ခုနှစ်တွင်မွေးဖွားခဲ့ပြီး Osafune ၊ Setouchi မြို့၊ Okayama ခရိုင်ဇာတိဖြစ်သည်။ Doshisha အထက်တန်းကျောင်းတွင် ပညာသင်ကြားခဲ့သည်။ သူသည် မူလယ်အထက်တန်းကျောင်းတွင် အသင်းခေါင်းဆောင်ဖြစ်ပြီး၊ Doshisha University ၏ ဘေ့စ်ဘောကလပ်အသင်း၏တာ၀န်ခံတစ်ဦးအဖြစ်တာ၀န်ထမ်းဆောင်ခဲ့သည်။  Kikkoman Corporation>>Ohmachi Co., Ltd. တွင် အကြီးတန်းအုပ်ချုပ်မှုဒါရိုက်တာအဖြစ်တာ၀န်ထမ်းဆောက်လျက်ရှိသည်။
mm.label_team_detile_11: အသင်း၏သမိုင်းကြောင်း
mm.label_team_detile_12: Setouchi Blue Shines အမျိုးသမီးဘေစ်ဘောအသင်းကို ကစားသမား၁၃ဦးဖြင့်ဖွဲ့စည်းထားပြီး၊ Okayama City ရှိ Okayama Gakugeikan အထက်တန်းကျောင်းနှင့် IPU Pacific Rim တက္ကသိုလ်မှ ကျောင်းသူများပါဝင်သည်။   2023ခုနှစ်ဖေဖော်ဝါရီလတွင် တည်ထောင်ခဲ့ပြီး၊ ခရိုင်တွင်းရှိ တတိယမြောက် အမျိုးသမီး ဘေ့စ်ဘောအသင်းဖြစ်သည်။
mm.label_team_detile_13: လေ့ကျင့်ရေးကွင်းတည်နေရာ
mm.label_team_detile_14: Setouchi Blue Shine ရဲ့ လေ့ကျင့်ရေးအားကစားရုံ
mm.label_team_detile_15: စာတိုက်အမှတ်1373-3 အိမ်နံပါတ်701-4262 Higashisue၊ Osafune-cho၊ Setouchi မြို့Okayama ခရိုင်
